name: NSG
description: Idealized by a group of friends while they participated at the Global Game Jam 2016, Studio Kraken is a small game development studio located in Natal, RN, Brazil. They focus on developing Narrative Games. By creating games using point-and-click mechanics, visual novel styles, etc, the Studio Kraken has the objective of encouraging reading habits and stimulating the imagination through ludic, captivating, and entertaining experiences.
